description: This file defines functions for building a Word document (DOCX) as a Statement of Work (SOW) using the 'docx' library. It includes layout and content generation functions, such as creating title blocks, tables for work parameters, deliverables, milestones, and signatures, as well as filename generation. The main exported functions are buildSowDocx for generating the document Blob and makeSowDocxFilename for naming conventions.

methods.name: buildSowDocx(data, _templateSchema)
methods.description: Asynchronously builds a DOCX Blob representing the Statement of Work document based on input data, assembling various layout sections.

methods.name: makeSowDocxFilename(data)
methods.description: Generates a filename for the SOW document, incorporating client, title, and current date.

methods.name: titleBlock()
methods.description: Creates the title section of the document with a centered 'Statement of Work' and 'Master Services Agreement' headers.

methods.name: introParagraph(meta, td)
methods.description: Produces the introductory paragraph referencing the Master Services Agreement and linking to the supplier and company names.

methods.name: workOrderParametersTable(td)
methods.description: Creates a table summarizing work order parameters such as client, project type, dates, and scope.

methods.name: simpleTwoColTable(title, text)
methods.description: Constructs a two-column table with a header and optional content, used for deliverables sections.

methods.name: milestonesFinancialsTable(td)
methods.description: Builds a table listing milestones and financial info, including total cost and pricing rate.

methods.name: continuationParametersTable(td)
methods.description: Creates a table with key continuation details like client relationship, escalation contacts, and points of contact.

methods.name: formatPocList(poc)
methods.description: Formats a list of points of contact, supporting array and string inputs with detailed object formatting.

methods.name: authorizationTable(meta, td)
methods.description: Constructs the signature section with spaces for signatures, names, titles, and dates for both parties.

methods.name: buildHeader(_meta)
methods.description: Constructs a minimal header for each page of the document.

methods.name: buildFooter()
methods.description: Constructs a minimal footer for each page of the document.

methods.name: makeCell( children, { widthPct, vAlign = VerticalAlign.TOP, padding = 120, opts = {} } = {} )
para( text, { bold = false, size = 21, align = AlignmentType.LEFT, after = 120 } = {} )
